titles: Two letters of note the one master speakers letter ordered by the honorable House of Commons to the high sheriffe and gentry of Yorke-shire : the other from the lords of the counsell in Ireland to the high court of Parliament here in England, &c.
author: Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.
Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
notes: First letter dated at end: 16 Martii, 1641.
Attributed to William Lenthall.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Year of publication from Thomason Coll.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
